message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I'm aiming for something closer to $13,800. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counter your offer at $13,600. I hope this proposal works for you.
